title: Tomino
short-description: A chef-robot that will help you prepare your next cooking masterpiece.

title: CYBYWY
short-description: CYBYWY is a tutorial game promoting self-checks for breast and testicular cancer.

title: Polpo di Fulmine
short-description:
A food delivery app for a restaurant, the owners also have another app to manage orders, and a web back-end where to manage their food offer. 
The app supports online payments via Stripe API.

title: FlexContainer
short-description: FlexContainer is a react component to make flexible layouts easier in React.

title: Line
short-description: A modern software for nutritionists and dietists to make the process of creating diets easier and more streamlined.

title: Anthropocene
short-description: Anthropocene.otf is a free parametric typeface that is linked to an air quality index which dynamically and constantly changes its design, following your local current air status trends.

title: Companion
short-description: My thesis project, a programmable voice assistant made with Electron, nlp.js by AXA for the NLP part, kit.ai's snowboy for the hotword recognition, and google TTS APIs
